EmailTemplate.name: Decoding Retail - eBook Phase.Send Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Should I Take {{company.Company Name:default=My Store}} Completely Cashless Now?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: We all know by now that people are cagey about too much contact with shared surfaces and items in-store.Sometimes that includes cash. There was even a pandemic-related coin shortage.Sounds like going cashless is the obvious move, right?Not so fast.Â Read our latest article to learn more. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
